notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.N.B. and N.M.N. conceived and designed the whole experiments; R.A., I.S., M.T., C.F.L. and C.S. performed the experiments and analysed the data; S.N.B., N.M.N. and S.C. contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools; F.I. and N.F.R. performed the cytotoxicity test; R.A., I.S., C.F.L. C.S, S.C., T.S., T.T. and S.N.B. wrote and edited the paper. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
